name: Toji Morimoto
title: Founder & CEO
bio: Toji has helped multiple American Tech companies enter Japan and build a profitable team from scratch through consulting and headhunting. Contributed companies include Magic Leap, SKydio, SharkNinja, Klook, Litmus Automation and more.

name: Akie Hamagishi
title: Chief Global Officer (CGO), Global Strategic Alliances
bio: Akie has over 20 years of Strategic Alliance & Marketing, Partner Relationship Management experiences worldwide (connecting Japan to the World) in BPO industry.

name: Ayami Oe
title: Head of Sales
bio: Ayami achieved the best sales record at DocuSign in the inside sales team. She was quickly promoted into Enterprise Account Manager for the financial, manufacturing and telecommunication industries. She has extensive knowledge on maximizing business efficiency by technology in the complex enterprise companies.

name: Mclsiah Kendema
title: Head of Language Programs
bio: Mac used his extensive experience as a translator and English teacher to develop customized courses for grade-schoolers to white-collar workers to improve their language skills. Coupled with his entrepreneurial knowledge he makes a strong addition to our language program.
